price: 28. Malheur à moi ! Si seulement je n’avais pas pris untel pour ami !
arabic: يَٰوَيۡلَتَىٰ لَيۡتَنِي لَمۡ أَتَّخِذۡ فُلَانًا خَلِيلٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: yāwaylatā laytanī lam attakhidh fulānan khalīlan
